title: Toasted Seed and Tahini Slaw
blurb: Mixed toasted seeds add extra crunch, flavour and nutrients to coleslaw. You needn't stick to cabbage and carrots - try grating any other root veg you have in your box. This one’s good served with chicken wings and potato wedges.

ingredients.preparation: core and tough ribs removed, leaves very finely shredded

method: Toast the mixed seeds in a dry frying pan for 1-2 minutes over a medium heat, until fragrant.
Mix the yoghurt, garlic, tahini and lemon juice in a large bowl.
Add the cabbage, carrot, onion and toasted seeds, season with salt and pepper and toss gently to combine.
other: VARIATION: This also works well with shredded red cabbage.
